Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: BahamaBoi
Reviews.Content: I'm no tech but I installed this and setup my network in less then 15 min and it was easy, this unit is smaller then you would think but that's great it takes up very little space on a shelf or in a cabinet. If you want quality this is it and there is plenty of setup videos on YouTube, customer service is A++++

ProductInfo.Features:
Eight Camera inputs, 500GB Hard Drive
Advanced H.264 Linux Embedded DVR, Multiplex-Live, Playback, Recording, Backup, Network. 120fps at D1 recording.
Support 3G Phone; Free App for Blackberry, iPhone, Android, Tablets, Mac Compatible Remote Software
USB 2.0 Built-in for Mouse Operation, Backup, and Firmware Upgrade, USB Mouse, IR Remote Control GUI
Web-Based Client w/ Multi-User Access, Automatic Private IP Addressing, Simple & Free DDNS Support, NTP (Network Time Protocol), Network Bandwidth Control, Text or E-mail Event Notifications with Snapshots
